EmailTemplate.description: EPH-6329 BOB MGMT - Submit / Approve / Activate BOB
EmailTemplate.name: BoB Submission
EmailTemplate.subject: New BoB Submission â€“ Your Confirmation is required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!GCX_LEAD}
{!BOB__c.OwnerFullName} has submitted a new BOB {!BOB__c.Name} that requires your confirmation.
Please click here to view and confirm the proposed BOB Link to the BOB.
If you would like to raise any questions before you confirm the submitted BOB please use the Chatter Box on the right side in the BoB Object.
Thank you, HIVE
